title: Bloomberg's McCracken on Monsanto, Nizza on Trump Pivot (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's McCracken on Monsanto, Nizza on Trump Pivot (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUESTS: Jeff McCracken, Managing Editor of Global M&A for Bloomberg, on Monsanto and Bayer said to be moving closer to a deal. Mike Nizza, Executive Editor for Bloomberg Politics, on Trump pivoting off his mass deportation immigration proposal.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
